# Tapajos Conversion
```{r reading in data}
library(tidyverse)
data_raw <- read.csv("../../NCEAS_SPARC/TG07_km83_Tapajos_P_McGroddy control direct only.csv")
```

```{r converting from stocks to concentrations}
# adding depth 
data <- data_raw %>% 
  mutate(depth = "0_10") %>% 
  select(collection:core,depth,everything()) %>% 
  mutate(bulk_density = as.numeric(bulk_density))

# columns to convert 
# P_NaHCO3
# P_NaOH
# P_1M_HCl
# P_conc_HCl
# P_H2SO4

data <- data %>% 
  mutate(P_NaHCO3 = ((P_NaHCO3/bulk_density)*10^2),
         P_NaOH = (( P_NaOH/bulk_density)*10^2),
         P_1M_HCl = ((P_1M_HCl/bulk_density)*10^2),
          P_conc_HCl =  ((P_conc_HCl/bulk_density)*10^2),
         P_H2SO4 =  ((P_H2SO4/bulk_density)*10^2))
```

```{r export data}

write_csv(data,"../Tapajos_McGroddy_Silver.csv")

```
